Engine API Reference
====================

This page is generated from docstrings via Sphinx autodoc.
It is intended for contributors who want to understand or extend the engine.

.. note::

   LedgerLoom is still in early versions. The engine API is intentionally small
   and conservative. We prefer adding new helpers over changing existing behavior.
